channel.title: Comments on: Code quality of saltstack is …

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
I got bit by this: https://github.com/saltstack/salt/pull/15901 , I did not have problem without this fix, but I have to patch salt code after their fix, to remove their changes so to make things work.
Code quality!!!
item.content:encoded:
I got bit by this: https://github.com/saltstack/salt/pull/15901 , I did not have problem without this fix, but I have to patch salt code after their fix, to remove their changes so to make things work.

Code quality!!!
